sub_title: Freelance language specialist in Arabic and English
summary:
I am a sworn freelance translator and interpreter in Arabic - Dutch and Dutch - Arabic with a broad experience in the legal, medical, and financial field. My past clients include Media Monks, Creative Virtual, Creative Studios, Damen and Clingendael. I have worked a lot with translation agencies, such as Global Talk, AvB, Elycio, Livewords, Courtesie, JKT translations and Livewords.
I owe my experience to working two years as an inhouse translator at Global Talk (previously TvCN). In addition, I followed a legal translations course at the SIGV.  I passed for the exams in 2017, so now I am a sworn translator also.

I have also a done of subtitling services for Family 7 in English-Dutch and Invision Arabic-Dutch. I also have teaching experience with students of the Arabic language.

Besides written translations, I have also done a lot of oral translation work (interpreting) in the Syrian and Egyptian dialect.  My clients include IND, DTV, Nidos, Vluchtelingenwerk, schools, lawyers, court, hospitals, and healthcare organisations.  I gained knowledge of the Syrian dialect through working as a volunteer with Vluchtelingenwerk. In my work there, I also gained a lot of knowledge of asylum law and helping people with the social challenges they face in society. In October 2020 I passed my exam as a sworm interpreter.

My greatest interest are the Arabic dialects and getting to know more about them.
